text: 'No!' the Chief Captive said with both mouths. 'Before she can enjoy, Lily-yo and plan.' 'The invasion?' Bondi asked. 'What else? Flor and Lily-yo, you arrive here at a good time. Memories of the Heavy World and its savage life are still fresh in you.
